profile:
At Canadian Roofing Company Ltd., we take pride in upholding 
the highest standard of quality & custom workmanship. We have been a family business for over 25 years and endeavor to keep our employees well trained in order to maintain our commitment to you of a job well done.  We are a Toronto based business and as a result only service the outskirts of the GTA by appointment only and for these clients interested in an estimate, there is a fee of $150 + hst which is refundable upon booking with us. It would be our pleasure to provide you with a detailed estimate for the work you are interested in having done. In addition to this, our goal is to answer any questions you may have and to educate you on the entire process, from start to finish. We look forward to hearing from you.

profile:
Twin Peaks Roofing and Aluminum Inc. opened for business in 2006 with decades  of combined experience  in the roofing industry. Our company’s mandate since our inception has remained the same: provide our customers with quality roofing products and service at reasonable rates. We understand that if you are happy with our service, you will refer us to your friends and family; it is our pledge to our customers to work hard for your business.

For your safety and that of our employees, we are insured and have WSIB clearance. All our company vehicles are clearly marked and our team of roofing specialists are highly trained in the latest roofing safety equipment and techniques for your peace of mind.

Honest ~ Reputable ~ Affordable

Residential ~ Commercial

profile:
FANATTICS (formerly known as Titans RoofWorks) specializing in FAN's & ATTIC's!

Our attic insulation installations are performed from the exterior rooftop. This means our team's are keeping distance, keeping safe, and keeping the dirty equipment from entering your home (attic hoses are just gross!), thus, NOT disturbing your everyday. 
We’ll enter through your rooftop vent holes to perform the entire service, and exit through them just the same. We’ll then cap them off with your new roof peak vent system! The larger, upgraded roof peak ventilator's allow our team's to get the job done without entering your home.

Try FANATTICS and you'll notice even larger monthly saving's on your Energy bill, and a more comfortable living environment, while extending the life of your roofing materials and AC unit! Protect your new insulation purchase from attic condensation and dry rot when upgrading with affordable rooftop FAN solutions.

profile:
Established in 1976, Luc's Roofing is a family owned roofing business that has been servicing the GTA for over 40 years. 
We offer shingle roofing and flat roofing services, plus low-slope, cedar and slate roofing.
 
Our goal is to ensure each and every customer has the security of a job well done. 
That's why we stress superior products, superior workmanship and superior service. 

Our motto, "We've got your peace of mind covered," guides all our activities and we work hard to live up to it! 

Please visit our website at www.lucsroofing.com
416-222-2672

We are following all provincial guidelines for Covid-19.
products:
(1) Roofing: shingle, flat and cedar
(2) Roof repairs and slate repairs 
(3) Flat and shingle roof insulation   
(4) Skylights.
services: Free inspections. Written estimates. Shingle and flat roofing and some complementary services. Our lead foreman is qualified as a Master Shingle Applicator and Flat Roof Installer.
brands: Certainteed, Owens Corning, Velux, Grace and Lomanco.

profile:
For over 15 years Smart Roofing Inc. has provided full service roofing for residential, commercial and industrial customers throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Our skilled, experienced craftsmen, aided by the reliable products, can accurately assess your roofing situation and expedite any job quickly and to your full satisfaction. 

We are dedicated to providing quality, professional installation and service commitment with fair prices. For your protection we are fully insured, bonded and licensed, and are proud members of the Better Business Bureau. We offer from 6 to 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship and only experienced crews of roofers are used. Smart Roofing has maintained these standards over the years and will continue to do such as our family of satisfied customers grows and shares their experience with peers, family and friends. 

Please contact us today for a free estimate or visit our showroom. At Smart Roofing Inc. "We protect what you value most". Make the SMART choice.

profile:
Imperial Roofs were awarded the Vaughan Citizen Readers Choice Award in 2011

In 1968 my father founded Cel Marchildon Roofing, which has grown into the company we have today.  Through commitment to excellence in our workmanship and materials we have built our reputation of TOTAL CUSTOMER SATISFACTION by providing our customers with the BEST ROOFING SYSTEM that will accommodate their needs and budget.  We will provide you, our valued customer, with a detailed assessment that will outline the specific requirements for your home. 

Our expert staff is committed to providing you with the BEST ROOFING EXPERIENCE available in the GTA.  All workers are covered by WORKERS COMPENSATION.  Our company is fully LICENSED AND INSURED to provide you with a WORRY FREE ROOFING EXPERIENCE.  We DO NOT USE ROOFING SUB-CONTRACTORS.  All work is performed by our expert employees. 

This may or may not be your first time purchasing a new roof, however we would like to outline some of the key factors in our operating process:

?	Provide a copy of our Insurance Certificate
?	Provide a copy of Workplace Insurance Safety Board Certificate upon request
?	Provide a copy of our Operating License 
?	Protect your home and surrounding area from falling debris
?	Tear off all old shingles to the roof deck
?	Inspect the wood deck for rotting and warping areas
?	Install eave protection to all insulated eaves 
?	Install name brand shingles with your choice 25 years to limited lifetime guarantee
?	Install proper ventilation to the roof (1sq ft for every 300 sq ft of attic floor area) 
?	Install new metal flashing where needed or refurbish to “new” standards
?	Install closed valleys with aluminum underneath to ensure maximum protection 
?	Full property clean up using magnetic sweeps and trailers to ensure no driveway damage
?	All employees are Fall Safety accredited and Crew Chief First Aid and CPR trained

Services We Provide:
*Asphalt Shingle Replacement
*Gutters, Soffit & Fascia
*Siding - Vinyl, Aluminum
*Leaf Screen for Eavestroughs
*Rooftop Snow & Ice Dam Removal
*Roof Repairs
*Roof Evaluations
*Cedar Shakes
*Slate Roofs
*Insurance Claims
*Ventilation Upgrades

profile:
Integrity Roofers is a licensed, certified and insured roofing company serving residential and commercial property owners in Toronto and the GTA.

Grounded in our ethics and principles, as people and as a company, we provide roofing services that are professionally executed and fairly priced.

Industry Credentials
Certified by CertainTeed, Integrity Roofers’ contractors are certified Quality Masters and Shingle Applicators.  We bring 20 years of roofing experience to the table, with the required knowledge and expertise to provide quality roof installations, repairs, and replacements.  With $2,000,000 in liability insurance, both your home and our contractors are covered for any unforeseen or unlikely incidents that may occur on the job.

Friendly and Approachable
Integrity Roofers’ contractors are pleasant to work with and open to hearing any questions or concerns you may have.  We are here to serve you in the best way possible, offering educational and practical tips wherever we can to extend the longevity of your roofing system.

All Stars Roofing Inc. has been providing Roof installation services for more than 25 years. We are proud of our work in the community and will continue to provide professional roofing services. Our service areas include Oakville, Burlington, Mississauga, Halton Hills and Etobicoke.

profile: WE ELIMINATE YOUR RISK 97% of our customers recommend us (We have surveys dating back since 2004, all available for your review) Saving You Time by concisely providing all of the information you need to make a decision Saving You Money by installing your project the right way the first time Reducing Your Stress by providing you with consistent quality through proven systems and procedures - 2016 GEM of Etobicoke-Lakeshore – awarded for exceptional service provided to the residents of Etobicoke- Lakeshore, presented by local MPP Peter Milczyn - 2016 Guardian “Readers' Choice” Award - Voted Etobicoke's Best Roofing Company for the 15th consecutive time - Peter Walker has been awarded membership of CertainTeed Roofer's Advisory Council for 2016, there are less than 50 members in all of North America and members must be proven leaders in the roofing industry - 2015 winner of Homestars' “Giving Back Award” - 2015 CertainTeed Platinum Award for highest customer satisfaction surveys TrackRecord - #1 in Canada for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs Installed - Better Business Bureau (BBB) “A+” Rating; no complaints - Certified Contractors Network Member - Infinity Windows from Marvin Exclusive Distributer of fibreglass replacement windows in Central and West Toronto and Mississauga - CertainTeed Select Shingle Master (Tenured Member Highest Ranking Available) - Manufacturer’s 50-year non-prorated, transferable labour and material warranty - 2015 Guardian "Readers' Choice" Award – Voted Etobicoke's Best Roofing Company - 2014 CertainTeed Diamond Award for highest customer satisfaction surveys TrackRecord - 2014 Guardian “Readers’ Choice” Award – Voted Etobicoke’s Best Roofing Company - 2014 Guardian "Readers' Choice" Award – Voted Etobicoke's Best Window Company - 2014 Ranked Top 20 in North America for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs Installed - 2013 Ranked Top 20 in North America for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs Installed - 2013 Guardian “Readers’ Choice” Award – Voted Etobicoke’s Best Roofing Company - 2013 Guardian "Readers' Choice" Award – Voted Etobicoke's Best Window Company - 2012 Ranked Top 20 in North America for most CertainTeed SureStart Plus Long Term Warranty Roofs installed - 2012 Town Crier “Silver” award winner – Roofing Category - 2011 Town Crier “Best in Town” – Central Toronto’s Best Roofing Company award winner. We specialize in: *Shingle roofs: Steep-slope & low-slope *Flat roofs *Skylights *Chimneys *Repairs, maintenance and snow & ice removal from roofs *Eaves Troughs *Siding *Fibreglass windows & doors (Infinity from Marvin) *Patio Doors & Entrance Doors Peter & Greg Walker Contracting has been selected by Marvin Canada as GTA's exclusive supplier and installer of Infinity windows and doors with fibreglass frames. Infinity™ is top of class in all areas: design, structural strength & stability, thermal performance/energy efficiency, window seal performance, corrosion resistance, lowest maintenance, colour retention, climate durability (hot & cold) and maximum glass area. Visit www.infinitywindows.com for complete product information. *Energy Efficiency: Home comfort - no drafts, energy saving, top thermal performance, high performance low EII glass is standard. *Superior Materials: Low maintenance, durable, looks good over time, Infinity's Ultrex fibreglass frame is 8x stronger than vinyl, extremely durable - won't warp, dent or fade. *Appearance & Design: Attractive, easy to operate, easy to wash, designed to replicate the beauty of traditional wood window. *Professional Installation: Peace of mind, no-hassle experience, installed by local window experts, transferable warranty *Total Value: Satisfaction of the best windows for the best price, superior performance, appearance, design, reliability & expertise. Marvin has been one of North America's largest manufacturers of custom windows for nearly 100 years. Ultrex fibreglass from Marvin has been used for nearly 20 years. Exterior & Interior colour options are available as well as thermal glass package and other options.

profile:
ROYAL YORK ROOFING has been successfully servicing the Toronto and GTA for years. Specializing in residential, commercial, industrial and institutional new Roof Installations and Repairs, we are able to service all your roofing needs in an experienced and timely manner. Our vastly diverse portfolio of past work, speaks for itself in the lengths and bounds we go to in ensuring the best roofing choice for your specific roofing needs.
 
SERVICES: We specialize in a broad spectrum of roofing services including, new sloped (asphalt shingle, cedar, slate, metal, copper) and flat roof (2-ply, 4-ply, EPDM, TPO) installations, re-roofing, roof repairs/maintenance, and sheet metal works. Additionally, we offer a wide variety of related services that help eliminate hiring multiple contractors which in exchange you get hassle free roof, and the luxury of having to deal with just one company without the middle man as we take care of all the arrangements. Some of our additional services include: eavestroughs, copper / aluminum works, siding, waterproofing, masonry, carpentry, siding, attic ventilation inspection, demolition and disposal.
 
WHY ROYAL YORK ROOFING: When choosing our company, we guarantee a professional and experienced team member to assess your needs. Our representative will explain how we can help you and offer you an honest and fair quote. Our team of professional roofers is fully insured, licensed and have an impeccable standing with the WSIB. All our work is stamped with written workmanship warranties for up to 15 years depending on materials used; a commitment that truly shows our confidence and credence in our work.

profile:
John Stewart, owner of J. STEWART ROOFING Ltd, has been installing roofs for the Toronto area homes and small businesses for over twenty five years. John is an experienced roofer having started roofing at a very young age he learned the basics of roofing and gradually became proficient in both shingling and then flat roofing. These two very different types of roofs require a different knowledge base and a real understanding of this can only be gained through actual hands-on work, so that one can see exactly how the materials work together and why.  

Flat roofs are particularly tricky to do and have become a specialty for J. Stewart Roofing Ltd. (For further details check out the newspaper article from the Toronto Star on this website. It is vital to gain real knowledge of the materials & techniques to not get stuck in just one way of doing things and stop there. Larry and John know how important it is to always keep up with the new roofing materials being invented and how they actually work in the field. In this way they have gained a greater library of knowledge on which to draw from, enabling them to know what combination of materials best for each unique customer’s job are presented to them. 

We specialize in all areas of roofing:

Shingle Roofs 	Flat Roofs 	Repairs & Maintenance
Asphalt 	Modified Bitumen

profile:
We Are Still Open - COVID-19 Business Update
Now more than ever, we all play a part in keeping each other safe & healthy. With so much new information and so many sanctioned changes, all of us here at RoofRepairs.ca are committed to being a part of the solution. 
RoofRepairs.ca is deemed a company that provides essential services and we will continue to support & service homeowners with their roofing emergencies. With respect to the services we will continue to provide, our team has interpreted Premier Ford's release, with the understanding that homeowners still need repair work done to keep a safe & sanitary home to protect their families.
To that, we will continue to provide emergency repairs only, ones that will allow our people to remain a safe distance from one another and still provide a successful repair. At this time, until a means can be figured our, we will not be doing non-essential work, work that requires multiple people on site, nor will we be entering homes, which we usually do as part of complete investigation.
Please know that we will continue to help you as best we can while keeping everyone safe. We are a small business and our client's are at the heart of it all. My team & I are dedicated to working together in helping keep our community safe and healthy.
With Care,
Brad Wyatt
Owner of RoofRepairs.ca
specialities: We specialize in smaller and emergency requests
name: Roof Repairs.Ca

We specialize in the installation, maintenance, and repair of various residential and commercial roofing systems. Three Bros Squirrels Roofing is fully licensed and insured. Our 24 hour service and quick response makes the difference in roofing Toronto throughout all seasons!

Whether it involves flat or shingle roofs, skylights or roof repair and maintenance, the experts at Three Bro Squirrels Roofing are dedicated to the highest level of customer service and quality workmanship offered in Toronto and the GTA roofing industry.

Our services include inspection, consultation and recommendation of proper methods, materials and estimates to solve all our customers’ individual requirements. Our work is fully guaranteed, backed up by great warranties and provides our customers with piece of mind in knowing that their roof will last for years to come. That's how confident we are about our roofing services.

profile:
FAMILY OWNED FOR MORE THAN 60 YEARS
Since 1953, Cherry & Hoyle Roofing has been a successful family business, spanning over three generations while catering to the roofing needs of Oakville and the surrounding area. We are able to offer the highest standard of workmanship, customer service and saftey in the roofing industry.

When you give Cherry & Hoyle Roofing an opportunity to address your concerns about your roof, it starts with our professional sales team. Our sales staff are fully qualified to handle your concerns. Rest assured, that our sales team will give you an honest opinion, professional quote and a satisfied feeling that all of your concerns have been properly addressed and answered.

You've agreed to our estimate and now it's time for the installation of your new roof or repair. This is where our years of experience, the pride of workmanship, concern of saftey and the respect of your place of business or home is what our installer have to offer. Our crews are fully trained and have master certifications in multiple roof applications. Plus, with three generations of experience behind our crews, there isn't a problem we can not solve.

profile:
At Leading on Edge Roofing we strive to be complete in every aspect. Whether it be a repair, roof replacement or emergency service, our thorough attention to detail covers your roofing needs completely. We provide in house metal fabricating and have strategic alliances with electrical and plumbing contractors for a complete range of related services. Our insistence on safety training for our employees and in taking measures on-site means that your people and ours enjoy a safe working environment. Along with our reputation for honesty and standing behind our work, we believe in good communication so you know how your job is coming. Complete job, complete assurance, complete satisfaction.    

CLEAN:

Although Clean is not a word normally associated with the roofing industry, it describes our company in more ways than one. Our “clean site” program ensures your facility will be kept tidy for the duration of the job. We go the extra mile, pressure washing, sweeping, raking etc. to ensure that our customers are satisfied. And when it comes to relationships - clean means integrity. Its how we treat our suppliers, our employees and of course our customers. Rest assured that everything we do is responsible, legal and safe. In short, we care.

COSTS EFFECTIVE: 
At Leading on Edge Roofing we believe in fairness and respect. We only recommend the services you need. From a brand new roof to our annual service programs, we are committed to providing you with cost effective solutions to meet all your roofing needs! We choose only durable quality products for our experienced and efficient team to apply, ensuring your roof is done right. “Done right” means longer lasting. Now that’s saving you money and headaches.

services:
Roof Repair

Any roof material may be in need of repair from time to time. having your roof occasionally inspected and/or repaired by professional roof repair contractors will increase your home's resale value and reduce any risk of moisture intrusion. Noticing broken, torn or missing shingles is a sign that the roof might need to be repaired or replaced. In some cases, the entire roof may not need to be replaced, only repaired. Any obvious deterioration or leaks are also signs that your shingle or flat roof may be in need of repair.

Shingles

Count on Awash Roofing and Renovation to install shingle roofing systems in the Toronto, Ontario area. Our roofing and home renovation professionals have what it takes to give your home the best. We are the perfect choice, thanks to our years of experience installing, repairing, and maintaining these roofing systems.

Siding

Our different siding products protect your home from hard climate: the sun, the snow storms, the thunderstorms can cause real damage to your house.
Nothing will impact the appearance of your home more dramatically than the type of siding you choose. We sell the material that suits the style of your house and also fits your lifestyle.

Flat Roofs

Awash Roofing and Renovation specializes in installing a two-ply roofing system that is more commonly known as a "torch-on roof," consisting of a fiberglass-reinforced or polyester mat sandwiched between two layers of rubberized asphalt. These roofing systems are very durable but must be installed by professionals as an improperly installed torch-on roof will likely fail within the first 2 years. These flat roofs are an attractive option that is also very durable. Contact us to schedule our professional roofing services today.

"Green" Roofs

Go green with Eco-Star synthetic slate roofing, offering superior performance and durability. EcoStar products are manufactured with recycled rubber and plastics, making them highly flexible, sustainable, and environmentally friendly.
Renovations

We have the expertise and knowledge to get all your home renovations done for you. Whether you need your basement finished or your livable space remodeled, you can count on us for everything from start to finish. We use licensed trades to complete the required task to deliver the scope of work required to complete the job.

Eavestrough Soffit Fascia

Awash Roofing & Renovation takes great pride and care in all of our installations. Each eavestrough installation begins with a conscientious inspection of eaves, fascia boards and soffits. This is done so there are no surprises during the installation process.
Our seamless 5-inch eavestroughs are machined on site, thus avoiding the risk of breaking and scratching during shipping. Installed with hangers, our eavestroughs can be affixed to any type of roof or building structure.
name: Awash Roofing & Renovation

profile:
Kingdom Roofing Limited is a team of expert roofers available 24 hours a day to install, repair or do maintenance to your roof. Kingdom Roofing Limited provides the highest quality workmanship, using top quality materials at affordable prices. We are committed to offer honest and professional advice to all our customers. We do not want to sell you a roof that you do not need, that is why our services include preventative maintenance and repairs. We will help you extend your roof service life and avoid costly roof replacements.

What do you get from working with Kingdom Roofing Limited?
 
    Professional assistance available to answer your inquiries at any time
    Affordable solutions for your roof improvement or new roof installation
    Detailed working plan including a dateline for finishing the project
    Expert roof installers to repair, maintenance or install a new roof on schedule
    A mess free home or business. We clean the job site and make sure you are satisfied with the end result.
 
Our services include
 
    Installation of new roofs
    Repairs (leak repairs, skylight repairs, chimney repairs)

profile:
Vassa Enterprises offers homeowners a specialized one on one approach from beginning to end.  Owner and operator Tony Kavai will make sure you choose the right product at the right price.  Not having a sales team allows Tony to know first hand exactly what your expectations are and effectively make sure those expectations are delivered on.  Managing the sale himself also allows Tony to save you the hidden costs of commissions usually paid out to sales people, this he happily passes on to his customers.   To learn more about our product visit www.gerardusa.com

***
 
We offer you a quality stone coated metal roofing product manufactured by GERARD roofing technologies. This outstanding roofing material carries a limited lifetime warranty, which is not only transferable but also non-prorated. Whether your building is a residential house, apartment, commercial building, community house or a church, GERARD roofing tiles, shakes or shingles are the ultimate solution for your roofing need.
Gerard Stone Coated Steel, ‘Canyon Shake’ metal roof tile profile offers the best of all worlds for customers who want the look of wood shake with the strength and security of steel metal roofing.  Unlike wood shake, our premium stone coated steel roofing tiles will never need the costly maintenance, upkeep and replacement that natural wood shake roofs require.

***

Natural wood shake is not water proof, and needs to be maintained / treated for mold and fungus growth, and relies heavily on a vapor barrier underlayment to protect your roof deck. Our stone coated steel tiles are waterproof, and are categorized as a "dry under-deck" roofing system, keeping your roof deck dry year round under the most testing of conditions. With Gerard's stone coated tiles you won't need to treat for mold and fungus, and over the decades, your shake style roof will continue to look beautiful while delivering the best protection, as the day it was installed!

products:
Steel Metal Framed Roofing, 
Owners of our stone coated steel roofing products will also enjoy insurance premium reductions thanks to the fact that our metal roof tiles will never burn or blow off as do conventional / natural wood shake tiles. Today, many areas across the US no longer allow natural wood shake roofs, and it is no surprise that Gerard's stone coated Canyon Shake metal roof tiles have become the preferred alternative.

profile:
Meet the Independent Roof Inspection Team Servicing the GTA
At Independent Roof Inspection Services, we were salesman, estimators, and roofers. Roofing was what we did. We all climbed up ladders, loaded building materials and made a mess. However, when we were done, the property was always thoroughly cleaned up and the roofs didn’t leak anymore. We had a lot of satisfied customers but after years of being roofers, it was time for us to finally try something new. Because owner Dave Baughn had seen many mistakes and bad contractors throughout his years in roofing, he decided something needed to be done – hence, Independent Roof Inspection Services.

Independent Roof Inspection Services is not a roofing company offering to do inspections on the side. As an independent roof inspector, we offer our inspection services at affordable rates to homeowners, property managers, real estate companies, developers and landlords of residential, commercial and industrial properties across the Greater Toronto Area. Our detailed roof inspection reports describe the existing waterproofing, its age and condition, and all of your available options. While you may need to completely replace your roof, other times you might not need a new roof at all. Sometimes a repair or a partial re-roof may suffice. 
We inspect Commercial, Residential and Industrial properties and provide Project Management services, overseeing  flat and shingle re-roofing projects including custom new-build homes.

profile:
TorontoRoofing.ca boasts the city's most reliable, quality roofing professionals and diagnostic team. It's owner, Maciej Kiersnowski quickly developed a reputation as a specialist in the GTA after co-founding a roofing company in 2005. In contracting his services, you are promised a thorough and honest assessment of your residential or commercial property, a detailed recommendation of the scope of work required to address your roofing needs, followed by the a superior installation Toronto has come to expect from Maciej and his team.
Specializing in roof replacement, repair, new installations and emergency damage response, your satisfaction is our number one priority. TorontoRoofing.ca is an industry leading company, and our number one goal is to ensure you are left with an outstanding product and best ever contractor experience.

profile:
George Kent first opened in 1949 and has since completed over 80,000 installations.  We offer home improvement services for  the entire Greater Toronto Area from Oshawa, to Newmarket, to Orangeville, to Burlington, including Oakville, Milton, Brampton, Woodbridge, Mississauga, Etobicoke and all of southern Ontario.  
With this many years of experience, our reputation speaks for itself.  We are the only home improvement company in the GTA that offers a lifetime warranty on the original installation for our windows and roofing.  In comparison, most box stores offer 1 year on the labour and our best competitors offer 5 years.

We specialize in:
* Windows: Enerview Window and Door Solutions, Vinylbilt, Neat Glass, Energy Star, ecoEnergy, Pella, Laminated Sound Reduction Glass
* Window Styles: Casement, Awning, Double Hung, Single Hung, Double Tilt Slider, Single Tilt Slider, Double Lift Out Slider, Single Lift Out Slider, Low Profile Fixed, High Profile Fixed, Custom Shapes, Greenhouses, Bay Windows, Bow Windows
* Doors: Steel & Fiberglass, Enclosures, Patio Doors, Garden Doors, Storm Doors, Entryguard Doors, Dorplex
* Roofing: Shingle roofing, Flat roofing, Tile roofing, lifetime roofing products
* Shingles: Camelot, Capstone, Grand Slate, Slateline, Timberline HD
* Insulation: Spray Foam, Attic, Basement, Roof, Blown Insulation, Exterior Wall Insulation, BASF, Owens Corning
* Siding: Vinyl Siding, Aluminum Siding, Gentek

profile:
Assured Quality Roofing provides roofing and eavestrough services in the GTA for residential and commercial clients. Exceeding Ontario’s building code standards. Excellent customer satisfaction 25 years.

***
 
The reason people choose us over any of our competition is simple; We use the best materials, tradesmen and deliver the best in service and quality. Our tradesmen are paid according to the quality of work, rather than on the speed with which they do the job. This ensures top quality over a speedy job. It is far more important to us to do the job correctly and have a happy customer who recommends us to their friends. You have our guarantee that we will do the job right the first time. 

***
 
We never settle for the minimum building code standards it doesn’t cost a lot to go from a minimum building code standard to exceeding the building code standards. The owner is on every job site and has personally over seen thousands of jobs to a successful conclusion. You will be talking directly with the owner about the work you want done and any of the concerns you have. We also have a list of previous customers should you wish to have references.

profile:
Founded by Bruno Levesque in 1990, Let It Rain has grown from a single roofing contractor to become Mississauga, Toronto, and the GTA’s expert roofing company. Our business has grown because of our many customer referrals. At Let It Rain the quality of our work does the advertising for us. Our goal is to provide you with the most durable and energy efficient roof system by providing the best quality roofing in Toronto, Mississauga, Etobicoke and the Greater Toronto Area.  

Commitment To Quality:
Let It Rain is committed to continual research and development for all aspects of your metal, sloped or flat roof system. This includes shingles, ventilation and insulation. It is this unyielding commitment to quality that allows us to create the most durable and energy efficient roof for your home. We use custom parts and always make custom calculations to determine how we can maximize the life of your complete roof system. At Let It Rain we take pride in knowing that you are as comfortable under your roof as we are under ours. 

SERVICES INCLUDE:

Shingle Roofing:
Let It Rain installs a wide range of roofing shingles, including cedar, slate and fiberglass asphalt shingles. Let It Rain can replace your roof beautifully and ensure that it's guaranteed for life.

Roof Insulation & Attic Upgrades:
Installing a new roof is only as reliable as the insulation and attic underneath it. Let It Rain can not only replace your roof, but can make sure that it lasts a lifetime.

Aluminum:
To complement your roof installation, Let It Rain Roofing also installs aluminum siding, soffit, fascia, eavestrough and downpipes.

Flat Roofing:
Let It Rain offers flat roof installations and roof replacements for residential and commercial flat roofs.

Repair and Construction:
As a full service roofing contractor, Let it Rain offers roof maintenance and emergency roof repair in Mississauga, Toronto and the GTA.

Downspout Disconnection:
The city of Toronto’s Downspout Disconnection bylaw is now in effect. All Toronto homes must now disconnect downspouts from the city’s sewer system. See how Let it Rain can help you disconnect your downspouts.
services:
Shingle Roof:
At Let It Rain, we install a wide range of roofing shingles, including cedar, slate and fiberglass asphalt shingles. In addition to protecting your roof, our shingles can also improve the aesthetic value of your home because we offer a wide range of shingle colours and profile options.
Insulation & Attic Upgrades

Attic or ceiling insulation and roof ventilation are often ignored but have a large impact on the comfort of your home and the life of your roof. Without proper attic insulation and balanced ventilation, your attic will allow heat to escape, creating damaging moisture and ice build up. Let It Rain knows that attic insulation is an important part of the roof system. With a reliable and functional attic, Let It Rain ensures that your roof installation lasts a lifetime.
Aluminum

Let It Rain’s Aluminum Department offers a range of products and services to enhance the look of your home and protect it from the elements. Our suppliers provide aluminum for eavestrough, soffit and fascia in an array of colours to compliment your existing colour scheme.
Flat Roofing

Let It Rain installs flat roofs for both residential and commercial applications in Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Brampton and all communities in the GTA.
Let It Rain’s Production Manager, Peter Dann, has over 30 years experience in the commercial and residential fields and our professional and courteous crews deliver the highest quality installations of flat roofing. 
Roof Repairs and Construction

Regular maintenance of your roof can extend its life and prevent costly interior damage. Let It Rain’s Repair and Construction department will assist you in resolving a range of roofing related problems on both shingled and flat roofs. Our service extends throughout Mississauga, Toronto and around GTA.

Mandatory Downspout Disconnection

The city of Toronto’s Downspout Disconnection bylaw is now in effect. All Toronto homes must now disconnect downspouts from the city’s sewer system.
specialities:
What you need to know:

The Roofing System consists of three components that should be balanced to work efficiently.

    The Shingled Roof acts as an umbrella shedding water and snow off the building.
    Insulation separates the attic from the house interior creating a comfortable home environment and reducing energy consumption.
    Ventilation moves cool air into the attic and hot air out. It extends the life of the shingles and provides a comfortable living environment

profile:
My name is Harold Spissinger and I have been roofing for 31 years. I have been on the roof doing the actual work for this time and am on the roof for most jobs. My crew of men have been with me for over twenty years ( same guys ) and they are all family men. I have working for me, men who are dedicated professionals who care about the work they do.
     My goal is to provide the best value for the money as I deliver roofing systems done in accordance with the building code, manufacturers specifications(all of which I am extremely familiar) and all the by-laws. This ensures a roofing system which performs very well over long periods of time. All of my men are trained in Fall Protection and have their up-to-date certs by the Ministry of Labour.

services: Shingle roofing, flat roofing, complete skylight installations including carpentry and interior drywall work, repairs to existing roofs, rafter replacing and repairs including re-sloping of ponding flat roofs, new deck on flat roofs, insulation with the roofs either blown in or baton or styrofoam, all types of metal work including flashings using steel or copper or galvanized metal, aluminum work including gutters, down pipes, siding (siding of vinyl,composite,wood etc.), decks for flat roofs in pressure treated wood, cedar or composite materials.
specialities: Re-raftering collapsing roofs(all carpentry work). Experts at skylight installations (new or repairing existing), 30 year flat roofing systems, 30 year to 50 year shingled roofing systems. Ventilation systems to handle condensation issues. Re-sloping or ponding flat roofs. Termite roofing projects done with termite companys ( I am licenced to spray the roof when its open etc )

We are a family run company and have been in the roofing business since 1975. We use most brands of shingles but concentrate on Certainteed Landmark. This product is high-grade and aesthetic. Call us for a quote and see for yourself.

profile:
​​​​​MJ Guardian Roofing Ltd started off as a small locally owned business here in the GTA. Over the years, we expanded to Barrie, Kitchener and Niagara Falls Areas. The exceptional quality of our workmanship as well as our top customer service have made us one of the biggest and most noted company to service southern central Ontario.

​Our dedication to the craft has generated us a large client base in both residential and commercial roofing. What differentiates us from our competitors is the experience of our workers in the field, our competitive pricing, our flexible scheduling, as well as our commitment to our work.

We currently offer a wide array of roofing related services, including shingle replacements, flat roofs, metal roofs, eaves trough repair and replacements, soffits and fascia, rooftop solar system installation, skylight repair and installation, and attic spray foam insulation. We also cater to new constructions and townhouse co-ops. We prioritize the safety of both our workers as well as you and your family, and are fully insured and licensed. We also offer warranty for all our services.

Call our number today for all your roofing inquiries!​​

profile:
1 2 3 Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets 1 2 3 Roofing contractors apart.

We hold the accreditation of CertainTeed Shingle Master with CertainTeed St. Gobain, the world leader in shingle manufacturing. The stringent guidelines mandated by CertainTeed in the application of their product allows us to maintain the exceedingly high standards we are reputed for as roofers. 

123 Roofing services South Western Ontario, from Kitchener/Waterloo through, Hamilton, Halton, North York, Vaughan and into Barrie with sloped and flat roofing system replacements, eavestrough, skylight, shingles and attic insulation and ventilation work being our specialities.

Call today and one of our roofing systems consultants will be happy to help!

profile:
Sum-it Roofing contractors provide commercial roofing and residential roofing services in the GTA, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington and Milton

At Sum-it Roofing Inc., reliability, integrity and efficiency is our motto. Our fully licensed and insured commercial and residential roofers offer A+ roofing repairs or replacement at a fair and competitive price. We take pride in our work as we install the optimum roofing system to meet your budget. We are confident in our work that's why we are able to provide a 10yrs workmanship warranty. 
We strongly believe that a good roof comprise of more than just new shingles. Although it's important to select a durable roof shingles from a reputable manufacturer with a good warranty, Its equally important to have a proper underlayment paired with a high performance Ice & water membrane.
At Sum-it we create the perfect balance between cost efficiency and quality, Cheap is not our approach. With over 14yrs of roof installs we are ready to deliver what we do best, Roofs systems!

profile:
Reayou Roofing is a team of specialist Torontonian roofers who understand the city’s weather and atmosphere. Their output is built to last harsh winters, as a result.

They’re also certified and insured. That matters because unlike plumbing, roofing is an unregulated industry.

Therefore, it’s vital to hire a team that is certified and insured. You wouldn’t want to end up paying more in repairs for a weak roof later!

Another positive point about them when it comes to cost-efficiency is that Reayou l doesn’t have unreasonable charges even for custom roofing. This is based on what we’ve seen of past project quotes.

And whether you need a new roof or your current one needs an upgrade, Reayou doesn’t shy away from any project, however complex. Their estimates are given free and upfront, so you’re not up all night worrying about how much this new roof is going to cost you.

There might be a chance that you don’t even need to get your roof replaced entirely, actually. Reayou doesn’t always push clients to spend on new roofing, especially if you’re a homeowner on a tight budget.

Pros

Affordable
Extensive services
Free quotes upfront
Works fast
name: Reayou roofing inc

services:
Our Services

Roofing intallation

Leave your roofing installation to us! Our roofer carefully installs flat roofs in and around North York, ON. Rest assured, our roofing service is the best in the business.

Roof maintenance

Regular roofing maintenance doesn’t just upkeep your curb appeal. It can save you money in the long run, preventing leaks and storm damage.

Commercial roofing service

Golden Phoenix Construction Inc offers a commercial roofing service to businesses in North York, ON and the surrounding areas. Whether you need shingle installation or repairs, our roofing contractor will take care of it.

Seamless gutters

Seamless gutters are perfect for preventing water damage to your home. Without seams, they’re much harder to break and much more reliable in the long run.

Customer satisfaction is our number one priority, and part of our service is providing before, during, and after photos of the job site so homeowners can see the progress of the work being done.

Flat Roof

Shingles
We offer complete roofing services for domestic homeowners, from slate and tile to flat roofs, and everything in between; nothing is too small or large.

Repairs

Inspection

profile:
OUR STORY
Full Service Roofing Provide

TD ROOFING INC is fully licensed, insured to provide Commercial, Residential and Industrial services throughout Ontario. 
The fully certified Roofing professionals are able to complete anything from the most complex and large-scale construction projects to the smallest Roofing repairs.


At TD ROOFING INC we are driven by our commitment to excellence and always go above and beyond to make sure our clients are completely satisfied with our Roofing work. Our attention to details is what sets us apart from other companies in the business.

If you are looking for an Ontario Commercial, Industrial, Residential Roofing Company with experienced, well trained roofing professionals, where the owner is working first hand, shoulder to shoulder with all his team in every stage of the project, TD ROOFING INC is the right choice. We only use high quality materials and offer very competitive pricing.

We supply and install all of the following systems for flat, sloped and metal roofing:

Multi-ply (BUR/SBS)

Single-ply (TPO/PVC)

Shingles (asphalt/cedar/slate)

Residential metal work accessories

Metal Siding
services:
New Roof Construction

Roof Maintenance & Repair

Roof Replacement
specialities:
Asphalt shingles are the most commonly used system on sloped roofs. Asphalt shingles are in a wide variety of colors, styles and shapes. Asphalt shingles developments in durability and performance plus a professional installment ...

COMMERCIAL AND INDUSTRIAL

Built-Up Roofing system (BUR) is one of the oldest and most reliable commercial roofing systems. These roof systems often referred to as "tar and gravel" roofs. BUR consists of multiply plies of roof felts laminated together with bitumen ...

METAL SIDING

A residential roofing system must be outfitted with a metal soffit, fascia, eaves trough and downpipe. The soffit exists at the perimeter of the roof allowing air to pass through the roof structure for necessary ventilation. The fascia flashes the perimeter.

profile: At one point in their life, homeowners will have to deal with roofing problems, be it through repair and renovation or during the initial roof installation. It is one of those housing problems that are almost impossible to ignore for both the residential and commercial homeowners. Nobody would be comfortable living in a house with leaking or collapsing roof; it is not only dangerous to your life, your loved ones or your tenants, but also unhygienic and unhealthy. Also. there have been a lot of reported cases of tenants suing landlords/ladies for damages due to such eventualities, trust me you don’t want to be part of it. You, therefore, need a roofing partner who will always be there with you at every step of your home improvement process; that’s where Sparkle Roofing contractors come in.

profile: Danforth Rd. Roofing & Contracting has been serving the G.T.A. since 1990.  We are a family owned business and our goal is customer satisfaction -- treating your home as if it were our own.  Communication with the homeowner is our first priority which creates an open and honest relationship for both.  We thank you in advance for the opportunity to bid your project.  If you choose us, we will do everything to make your project move as quickly and smoothly as possible.  No decisions or changes will be made without discussing the same with the homeowners first.  As in any big renovation, unforeseen things do come up.  If this should happen, we will explain everything to our client so they understand it completely.  We look forward to working with you and making your home renovation a pleasant experience.  Work will commence seven (7) days upon acceptance of this proposal.

profile:
Why Replace? ...We Can Repair!
Our Roofing Repairs Company has been serving the GTA Since 1990!

Professional & Reliable Service with People you can Trust  .
When you have a leaking roof, why replace the whole thing when a repair will do? Get an assessment by Roofing Repairs Company! Specializing in roof repair services in Toronto since 1990, we enjoy fixing any residential or commercial roof in the GTA. We enjoy helping people save money instead of spending thousands. When you call, you’ll deal directly with the owner who also does the repairs – 24 hours a day, 7 days a week if needed. All our work comes with a written guarantee, every time. For more information or to schedule your repair, e-mail or call today!



Unmatched Service 
At Roofing Repairs Company, we provide a prompt follow-up on every job. When you call us, you’ll get an immediate response. We can repair on the spot, giving you same-day service when possible. We also provide preventative services. When a raccoon or squirrel gets in your attic, we’ll get him out, seal his entrance and animal-proof your home. Shingles, chimneys or eaves damaged by wind, hail or age? We’ll fix them all! Choose us to install gutter guards and we’ll clean the eaves too!



Specializing in Roofing Repairs Since 1990. 
Roofing Repairs Company provides unmatched service in residential and commercial roof repairs. Our company repairs a vast amount of roofing problems while providing our customers the opportunity to repair, as opposed to a complete new roof. Most of our customers have animal damage from raccoons or squirrels. A large amount of customers call us for leaks due to chimney flashings, skylights, wind damage, soffit and fascia, venting, valleys, eavestrough resloping and flat roof leaks. We gear our company towards solving all types of roof leaks. We serve the public 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, offering emergency and same-day service with on-the-spot repairs. Having a roof that is leaking is an important problem we make sure to solve. We meet the needs of our customers and prolong the life of the roof at a lower cost.

Promotions and Special Offers.
​
Receive a Free Sloping and Eaves Cleaning with Gutter Guard Installation

Every Job Comes with a Written Guarantee

Free Estimates

Our professional roofers serve residential, commercial, and industrial customers throughout Markham, Richmond Hill, the Greater Toronto Area, and all of Southern Ontario.

Beyond being warrantied, bonded, and insured, Trudel & Sons Roofing Ltd is popular with GTA homeowners and businesses for our experience, competitive pricing, and award-winning service. While our photo gallery and roofing portfolio may give you a glimpse into the quality of our craftsmanship.  With close to 40-years of experience, we can help you decide on a roofing material that is right for your home and family.
***
Once you read our reviews and see our A+ Better Business Bureau rating, you’ll understand why more of the GTA’s homeowners and businesses choose our team!

specialities:
We at Tirana Roofing & Dokaj Contractors Ltd combine quality professionalism and years of experience to each and every roof installation not just as a water shield, but rather, a work of art to be admired for many years to come. It’s a mixture that has been proven to be very successful and popular for all of our clients.

At Tirana Roofing & Dokaj Contractors Ltd, We have the man power for any size job and the ability to fulfill the dreams of today’s architectural masterminds. Using advanced installation techniques and the latest roofing materials; all of our jobs are completed per manufacturer specifications and in a timely manner. With choices ranging from composition shingles, clay tile, concrete tile to slate, wood, metal roofing or a simulation product; the decision on the type of material to use on your home or commercial office can be a difficult one indeed. We have built up a strong reputation in the local area, simply by doing a good job at a reasonable cost and on time. Ask your estate agent, architect or surveyor. They can tell you more about the quality of our work and why so many local people choose us. We can provide you with local references if you want them. Give us a call, we can help.

services:
Four Seasons Roofing Ltd.  takes care of all your RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL roofing needs, including:

RE-ROOF
Installation of additional roof layer over existing roof shingles without removing the existing roof layer. 
While re-roof is less expensive, it is not necessarily always the best choice. 
Local building codes also limit the number of roof layers that can be applied to a residence in your area.

TEAR OFF
Remove existing roof down to the structural deck before installing a new roof system. These are some key advantages of tearing off the old roof before installing a new one: 
Any roof deck defects are revealed when the roof is torn off. Condensation problems in the attic are revealed.
 Properly designed attic ventilation can be installed to help eliminate this problem.
Waterproofing shingle underlayment can be installed before installing the new roof. This will help to protect against leaks created by ice damage and wind-driven rain.

SHINGLES
We install and replace all types of roof shingles from Traditional 3-tab to Architectural shingles. Whether your house has a steep roof, low pitched roof, gable or hip roof we will find and install the shingles type and color that work for you and your budget.

REPAIRS & MAINTENANCE
At Four Seasons Roofing Ltd.  we pride ourselves on being able to handle any roof repair and maintenance for your house. Whether you only need to replace a few missing or damaged shingles, have major roof storm damage, a roof leak, leaking gutters or skylight, need to replace or repair a roof flashing, chimney housing, roof flashing, vent or roof valley,we will inspect your roof, offer suggestions and areas of concern, and be happy to fix your roof or gutter problem.You can always count on us when you need an Emergency Roof Repair.

GUTTER CLEANING
Gutter Cleaning and maintenance are an important but often most overlooked part of home ownership. Your gutters are the collection system on the edge of your roof. They are designed to divert water that is running off your roof to downspouts. Gutters also collect debris like leaves, twigs and dirt. If too much of that debris collects in your gutters, there is nowhere for the water to go, and gutter cleaning becomes necessary. 



***All labor / manufacturer warranties are transferable***

profile:
About Ontario Roofing & Property Care

Many people find it both a daunting and exhaustive task searching through multitudes of roofing contractors in order to find a reputable company with the relevant expertise to fix their roof. Here at Ontario Roofing & Property Care, we take away the stress and hassle of this task and are able to diagnose and offer an affordable solution to your roofing problem quickly and effectively.
 
Our team includes highly skilled qualified time served roofers, damp proofing specialists, qualified masonry professionals, asphalt & interlocking paving driveway team. 

All of our team has wealth of knowledge and expertise to cover all aspects of roofing, offering professionalism, reliability and a 100% satisfaction guarantee. All types of roofing work can be undertaken including commercial and residential. No commission based salesmen will call upon you, just experienced hands on assessors providing a cost effective no obligation quote, whereby the client’s best of interest are considered to be the heartbeat of our company.

profile:
EVERLASTING METAL ROOF
Our company offers you the best deal you can get, because you will deal straight with installer, It will help you to save up to 30% of what other companies would charge you. We have 10 years of Experience, $1 million Liability Insurance, and all our installers are covered by WSIB. Our company use only the best material there is on the market. We use only Sweden steel which have 7 layers of protection and a baked polymer coating. We don't use PVC or Acrylic painted steel. 
By choosing our company you will get: 
- A maintenance-free roof 
- An environmentally friendly building choice 
- 50 year warranty 
- Decrease in gas and hydro bills up to 40% 
- Great protection from wild life (raccoons and squirrels) 
And much more.

profile:
Specializing in residential roofing.

Thank you for giving Nouveau Roofing the opportunity to provide you with a free quotation on your highest valued asset, your home. 

We strongly believe that the key to a satisfied customer is strong communication. Being an informed homeowner means having all the information and options available at the time of agreement, ultimately leaving you satisfied with your decision making.

We strongly believe in transparency and options to fit all budgets. Some homeowners may not want to purchase every option while some may take comfort in more. That’s why we inform and leave the deciding to you! We also appreciate your requests...Some homeowners already have a certain manufacturer in mind or have additional products that they may want. Do not hesitate to make requests or ask questions.

Through Infrastructure Health and Safety Association of Ontario, we’ve completed the small business certificate program, consisting of five courses; Workplace Inspections, Personal Protective Equipment Awareness, Workplace Violence & Harassment Policies, and Incident Investigation to ensure everyone at Nouveau Roofing practises a professional and safe working environment.   

	Our expert staff is committed to providing you with the best roofing experience available in the GTA.  All workers are covered by workers compensation. We’re fully licensed & insured to provide you with a worry free roofing experience. We do not use roofing subcontractors. All work is performed by our expert employees. 

We would like to outline some of the key factors in our operating process.

Provide a copy of our Insurance Certificate
Provide a copy of Workplace Insurance Safety Board Certificate upon request
Provide a copy of our Operating License
Protect your home and surrounding area from falling debris
Tear off all old shingles to the roof deck
Inspect the wood deck for rotting and warping areas
Install eave protection to all insulated eaves
Install name brand shingles with your choice of 25 years to limited lifetime guarantee
Install proper ventilation to the roof (1sq ft for every 300 sq ft of attic area)
Install new metal flashing where needed or refurbish to “new” standards
Install closed valleys with aluminum underneath to ensure maximum protection
Full property clean up using magnetic sweeps and trailers to ensure no driveway damage 
All employees are “Working at Heights” & “WHMIS” trained. Site supervisor is First Aid & CPR/AED trained

All workmanship is guaranteed from 5 YEARS up to 15 YEARS and materials by the manufacturer.
services: Residential Roofing. Skylight replacements. Sun tunnel installations. Aluminum eavestrough, fascia and soffit. Roof repairs. Upgrading ventilation products.

profile:
Welcome to Star Renovations Ltd. We strive to make every customer a happy customer whether we are doing a small renovation or a full home renovation from basements to a 2nd floor including removal of load bearing walls, plumbing, open concept design, electrical, painting, taping, crown moulding, hardwood/porcelain tiling , dry-walling, insulation, kitchen renovations ( granite counter tops, back splashes, venting with hood fans ).  

*****

With 12 years of experience and a great dedicated staff we will make any project a smooth transition from beginning to end to ensure your satisfaction. We aim to stay on budget and on schedule as we know how important it is to you, the homeowner.

****

Give us a call today to schedule your appointment.

profile:
Exclusive modern European style Metal Roofing!  Extremely durable roofs guaranteed to last for over 50 years.  We employ unique installation methods and use the best in class materials.  

Our mission is to become the solution to all of our customer’s roofing needs by providing the highest quality metal roofing and exceptional customer service.
service_area: We serve Toronto, Hamilton, Burlington, Oakville, Mississauga, Milton, Vaughan, Newmarket, Aurora, Markham, Pickering, Ajax, Whitby and surrounding areas.
products: Residential and commercial metal roofing.  Our wide product range includes metal roofing tiles, trapezoidal sheets, siding panels, roofing accessories and cold-rolled profiles.
services: Professional roofing installation is what sets us apart from our competition.  Our roofing specialists ensure a comprehensive installation process from roof preparation and underlayment installation to the final clean-up.
brands: Zim Group Inc. is the exclusive distributor of ARECO (Sweden) metal roofing products in Canada and part of the U.S.
specialities: Our raw materials are ISO 9002 certified.  Combined with our installation technologies, this allows us to guarantee our products for 50 years!
name: Zim Group

profile: Where your family and home come first. With over 30 years of experience in the roofing business, we pride ourselves on our highly trained and qualified roofing team. We welcome any Mississauga or surrounding areas roofing or roof repair job no matter how large or small. All pricing on roofing contractor agreements is highly competitive and fair. Our professional roof repair services offer you the finest quality and craftsmanship in Mississauga and the surrounding areas. Unionized Contracting will get your roof / roof repair job done tight and right. The roof is the most important structural part of your home or office, and we take the roofing contractor business seriously. We know that a damaged or poorly installed roof can cause excessive damage to your home or office, make your living conditions unsafe, and ultimately cost you thousands in roof repair fees,. If you need roof repair services or an excellent roofing contractor, contact Unionized Contracting now! Don’t hesitate . . .we guarantee you will be satisfied with our roof repair services and that we are the finest and fairest roofing contractor in the area. Unionized Contracting is a family owned and operated contracting service in the GTA. We offer a wide variety of services. We are licensed bonded and insured and also BBB accredited. Our mission is to provide a loyal contracting service for the people of the GTA. Together with our employee's and many safety measures, we plan to provide a dependable & honest service. We offer a very personal experience and work with our customers to make sure every problem is properly taken care of. It is our guarantee that every customer is left satisfied with any service we have offered. Our philosophy is to change the way people think about contractors. We want our customers to feel individually important. "WE DO WHAT YOU NEED" We appreciate the chance to do business with great clients like you!

profile: Trusted since 1998, Interlock Metal Roofing is a professional roofing contractor located in Mississauga, Ontario Canada. Choose from five durable aluminum roofing profiles including Slate, Cedar Shingle, Shake, Mediterranean Tile, and Mechanical-Lock Standing Seam. All profiles are also available in Solid Copper. With the addition of solar brackets, all our roofing systems are solar compatible.
service_area: Interlock Metal Roofing provides service across North America (Canada and the United States)
products: Interlock Metal Roofing offers many styles and colors of quality metal roofing. Stringent industry tests are conducted on our shingle, slate, tile, shake, and standing seam profiles to confirm maximum protection from extreme climate conditions. Interlock Metal Roofing is protected by the exclusive Alunar Coating System embedded with Teflon surface protector.
payment_method: Flexible Payment. Financing oac. Available. Credit Card for down payment / Balance on Cash or Cheque.

profile:
WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED
Perfect Installs
Specializing in commercial, industrial and residential flat roofing. Your roof is your main defense against all Canadian elements. Let us walk you through the best options to fit your needs and once you feel comfortable with your choice, we'll handle the complete installation.

Reliable Upgrades
If you're looking to update or upgrade your roofing, we've got you covered. Book a consultation to discuss your project needs. 

Upkeep & Repair
Trade maintenance, age,  and environmental factors can wreak havoc on your roof. Ignoring problems for too long can result in costly headaches down the road. Preventative servicing can eliminate these concerns and keep your business or home safe.   


You could also find us here:
https://www.instagram.com/aj_roofing_and_construction/?igshid=dxhuousblinkz

Family owned roofing company, specialized in residential roofs and eavestroughs, proudly serving GTA since 2013. 

Contact us for a free estimate today! we will be happy to assist you on your roofing project. Avoid overpaying on your roof by cutting out the middle man. Big companies often subcontract their work and workmanship is compromised and rarely inspected. Our crews handle 100% of our work. 

We work with passion and with the belief that a happy customer will recommend our work and help us grow out our business. Give us your valuable business and your satisfaction will be our priority.

profile:
Providing Roofing for 10 years. Honest, experienced, reliable roofing company. 

We offer quality workmanship when completing your roof. Regardless if its a fix or doing a whole roof rest assured your in the right hands! We take pride in our work and ensure we provide you with the best quality available. We service Peel, Halton and the GTA areas. 

We pay attention to detail, show up on time, provide you with an outline of the job and what we will be doing as well as before and after pictures to ensure you are happy and our job is done well.

Our first consultation is FREE. During this consultation we will review with you the issues you are having and provide you with a consultation of seeing first hand your issue and how we will fix it. We also ask that you get at least two other quotes from other companies to ensure not only price but quality of services. 

We will walk you through our job and outline the task to be complete and how long (depending on weather of course! :)..) the job will take.

Call us now for free consultation!

We provide high quality , dependable roofing services; our trained professionals will work with you to help finish your next roofing project. We use only quality , time-tested products and materials with a quick response time and get the job done right. All products are guaranteed through the manufacturer's warranty.
